Metadata.title: Jan Zdenek
Metadata.description: An ambitious frontend developer with a keen eye for detail, strong analytical skills, and experience leading teams.

Aside.name: Jan Zdenek
Aside.quote: I create accessible, pixel-accurate frontend solutions for web and web applications.

About.title: About me
About.content:
I am an ambitious frontend developer with a keen eye for detail, strong analytical skills, and experience leading teams. I am career-driven and results-oriented, always striving to ensure my work has a real impact and is widely utilized.

Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to develop software in various environments—from companies specializing in custom web applications to large corporations utilizing proprietary frameworks.

Beyond work, education is a key part of my life. As a student at Unicorn University, I have successfully completed courses such as Cloud Application Architecture, Frontend and Backend Systems, and Mathematical Analysis & Discrete Mathematics.

In my free time, I focus on improving my frontend and backend skills, making music, and playing video games.

tabs.title: Front-end Developer • Yolk Studio
tabs.description: Built responsive websites featuring engaging 3D animations, multilingual server-side translations, and seamless cross-browser compatibility.

tabs.title: Web-app developer • eppTec
tabs.description: Designed and developed frontend solutions for banking processes at Česká spořitelna. Using TypeScript, I translated complex requirements into functional and scalable systems.

tabs.title: Front-end Developer • ka.soft
tabs.description: Designed and developed custom web applications, creating intuitive UX/UI designs, writing responsive, performance-optimized frontend code. Managed the full development lifecycle to deliver scalable, user-focused solutions on time.
